We refrain from having morbid discussions in this group since we are not the best place for advice. If you need help  call 1800-221-4444  the Samaritans of Singapore. I will delete your message now.

Death isn’t the final solution  because of who and what you are leaving behind. Sounds cliche but even if you are desperate  even if you are losing hope  feeling like no one is there for you  there will at least be someone  some people  who care for you  who worry for you. There will at least be some thing that you are living for  some thing that you are concerned about  some thing that you like. And if you haven’t found it yet  you will.Covid-19 put us all in a tough time  and I can understand. But this isn’t the time to end it. The situation will pass  and brighter times are ahead. Stay strong!
